name: Basic Controller (Hardware)
tagline: Build your own Aqua- Hydroponics controller, here is how...
body:
# Basic Controller Hardware ![Alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Modpon/basic-controller-hardware/master/images/controller-v1.jpg "The first build of the basic controller")

Here you will find:

  1. Parts list
  2. Arduino PIN list
  3. Wiring schema's
  4. Case design

Pump Control

  • Outputs: 3
  • Working: identical, they do the same thing unless you custom code
  • Power: 6-12v
  • Control:
    • Run time
    • Off time
    • Power

Lights control

  • Power: 12v
  • Control: on- off in code

Sensors

  • DHT11 or DHT22 temperature and humidity, visible on the screen
  • LDR, a basic light intensity meter, to do something..

Other info

  • Power: needs 12v adapter with 5mm plug
  • Screen: 128x128px TFT Oled
  • Controller: Arduino Nano with usb mini to connect to a pc
  • Software: Arduino language, based on c/ c++

Look in the Basic Controller Code repository for the Arduino code.
